name: Pianist's Rom Hub
description:
so my friend told me to make an itch.io for the roms I play, so I did.

Yup! This is completely legit. All of the files (currently) are for GBA(Game Boy Advance), and you will need a GBA emulator to run them. Personally, I'd use John GBA Lite if you were to do this on mobile devices. For PC, Windows and Mac, I'd say use No$GBA or Visual Boy Advance.

This is a non-profit project, just did this cause I felt like being a madlad. Also, roms are like super underrated.
